title: r/Prorevenge I Cost My Evil Landlord Over $100,000
description: r/Prorevenge In today's episode, OP has an evil landlord who doesn't care at all about his health, safety, or happiness. The landlord doesn't follow the proper protocols, which results in OP being exposed to asbestos, and his house being damaged. The landlord and her construction worker try to sweep the abuse under the rug, but OP turns the tables on them and hits them with a bill for well over $100,000!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
